widget.convert: {"templates": {"default": (30,[ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (5, 0), size = (30, 30), png = 2), # index 2: status-picture MultiContentEntryText(pos = (40, 1), size = (563, 27), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1), # index 1: text MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (618, 0), size = (96, 30), png = 5), # index 5: stream-logo ]), "default_without_picon": (30,[ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (5, 0), size = (30, 30), png = 2), # index 2: status-picture MultiContentEntryText(pos = (40, 1), size = (563, 27), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1), # index 1: text ],True), "info": (30,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5, 1), size = (250, 27), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 0), # index 0: text MultiContentEntryText(pos = (260, 1), size = (458, 27), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, color=0xf47d19,color_sel=0xf47d19 , text = 1) ],False), "menus": (30,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5, 1), size = (708, 27), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1), # index 1: text ],True), "about": (30,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5, 1), size = (708, 27), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, color=0xf47d19,color_sel=0xf47d19, border_width = 0, text = 0) ],False), "genre": (30,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5, 1), size = (708, 27), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, border_width = 0, text = 1) ]) }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22),gFont("Regular", 22)], "itemHeight": 30 }

screen.name: messagebox-template
screen.applet:
from enigma import eSize, ePoint, getDesktop deskwidth = getDesktop(0).size().width() deskheight = getDesktop(0).size().height() textsize_org = self["text"].getSize()
textwidth_add = 20 textsize = (textsize_org[0] + textwidth_add, textsize_org[1])
offset_listposx = 10 offset_listposy = 27 offset_listwidth = 12 offset_listheight = 30 offset_textwidth = 73 offset_textheight = 12 min_width = 400 min_height = 60 textwidth = textsize[0] textheight = textsize[1] + offset_textheight
listwidth = 0 listheight = 0
if self.list: try: for i in self.list: if len(i[0]) > listwidth: listwidth = len(i[0]) listwidth = listwidth * offset_listwidth listheight = len(self.list) * offset_listheight except: pass
if (min_height > textheight): textheight = min_height if (min_width > textwidth): textwidth = min_width
if (listheight > 0): offset = 14 else: offset = 4
if (textwidth > listwidth): wsizex = offset_textwidth + textwidth + offset_listposx * 2 else: textwidth = listwidth - offset_textwidth wsizex = listwidth + offset_listposx
wsizey = textheight + listheight + offset
if ((wsizey + offset_listposy - offset_listposx) >deskheight): textheight = deskheight - listheight - offset - offset_listposy + offset_listposx wsizey = textheight + listheight + offset
if (wsizex > deskwidth): textwidth = deskwidth - offset_textwidth - offset_listposx * 2 listwidth = wsizex = deskwidth
wsize = (wsizex,wsizey + offset_listposy - offset_listposx)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label textsize = (textwidth,textheight) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - offset_listposx * 2,listheight) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(offset_listposx,textheight + offset_listposy)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] newheight = wsize[1] self.instance.move(ePoint(int(deskwidth - newwidth)/2,int(deskheight - newheight)/2 + 19))

screen.name: choicebox-template
screen.applet:
from enigma import eSize, ePoint, getDesktop
deskwidth = getDesktop(0).size().width() deskheight = getDesktop(0).size().height() textsize_org = self["text"].getSize()
textwidth_add = 20 textsize = (textsize_org[0] + textwidth_add, textsize_org[1]) textwidth = textsize[0] textheight = textsize[1] height_offset = 8 middle_offset = 30 bottom_offset = 2 listitemheight = 30 width_offset = 10 windowwidth_min = 650
# improvise listwidth if textheight > 30: windowwidth_min = 768
# calc listheight count = len(self.list) if count > 15: count = 15 listheight = listitemheight * count
# calc windowwidth windowwidth = width_offset * 2 + textwidth if (windowwidth_min > windowwidth): windowwidth = windowwidth_min
# calc windowheight if textheight > 0: windowheight = height_offset + textheight + middle_offset + listheight + bottom_offset else: windowheight = height_offset + listheight + bottom_offset
# resize window windowsize = (windowwidth, windowheight) self.instance.resize(eSize(*windowsize))
# resize text self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (windowwidth - width_offset * 2, listheight) if textheight > 0: self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(width_offset, height_offset + textheight + middle_offset)) else: self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(width_offset, height_offset)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window self.instance.move(ePoint((deskwidth - windowwidth)/2, (deskheight - windowheight)/2 + 19))
